mapper.insert: insert into college_sort (id, sort, college, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, sort, college, create_time, update_time from college_sort
